.:...............................................................................:.
 ^                                                                               ^
                           XBMC - XBOX Media Center 2.0
                        Release Date...........03.Mar.2007
                        SVN Revision..................8004
                        Release Size................5x15MB
                        Release Language.....Multilanguage
                        Operating Platform.........M$-XBOX

.:...............................................................................:.
 ^                                                                               ^
   INFORMATION:

   This package is my little "contribution" to the scene.
   Hope you like it ... Comments & Suggestions are always welcome.
   Releases will be made available on TPB once a week, unless serious bugs
   are found, or something else important happens that justifies an Update.

   I take no credits for anything supplied here. IÃ‚Â´m not related to the developers
   in any way. I just compile the sources, collect some stuff and add it.

   ALWAYS REMEMBER:

   This is software in development - You should regard yourself as a BetaTester!
   Please read the complete Changelogs to keep yourself informed.
   Some features might still be in their initial development stages ...
   Please read this .nfo - it has some useful information, really ;-)
   Keep a tried and trusted XBMC Version handy, incase you need to go back !

   This is FREE SOFTWARE made by nice people in their valuable spare time !
   If you donÃ‚Â´t like it - Please Do Not Complain !!! Just stop using it !

.:...............................................................................:.
 ^                                                                               ^
   SKINS INCLUDED:

   Original Project Mayhem III Skin from CVS.
   Added Weather Display to Home Screen (visible only with Internet connection)
   It displays the currently selected city from the Weather menu.   

   MC360 from Team Blackbolt - incl. Superman Returns Theme + Carbon Fibre Theme 

.:...............................................................................:.
 ^                                                                               ^
   SCRIPTS INCLUDED:

   Apple Movie Trailers / FlexiBrowser / GameSpot Plus / GameTrailers RSS Reader
   Submenu Editor / WebRadio (SimpleKML V2) / XBMC Scripts / YouTube

   Get more Scripts via the XBMCScripts menu or @ http://www.xbmcscripts.com

.:...............................................................................:.
 ^                                                                               ^
   VISUALISATION ADDONS INCLUDED (All Zipped):

   G-Force:  1507 total (including the CVS supplied ones)
   MilkDrop MegaPack: 8355 total (including the CVS supplied ones)
   MilkDrop: BritneysPAIRS 110 favorite MilkDrop Presets
              
   Switch Vis to "Milkdrop GAS" or "MilkDrop BritneysPAIRS" to use them ... 

.:...............................................................................:.
 ^                                                                               ^
   ABOUT TRAINERS:

   There are 1443 Trainers included to give you a good start.
   I absolutely donÃ‚Â´t know which ones work and which donÃ‚Â´t ! 
   PLEASE do not ask me anything about the included Trainers.

   Trainer files reside in /UserData/Trainers. Use the context menu on a Game
   listed in MY PROGRAMS to refresh the Trainer List or to change Trainer options. 

   Get Trainers e.g. @ http://trainers.maxconsole.net (Free Registration required)

.:...............................................................................:.
 ^                                                                               ^
   HOW TO MAKE XBMC YOUR DASHBOARD:

   A configurable Shortcut for your -C-Drive is included in the XBMC ROOT dir.
   It points to E:/Apps/XBMC/default.xbe by default. If your XBMC Directory is
   elsewhere you must change its Application Path by editing the .cfg file !! 
   Rename the "ShortCut for -C-Drive.cfg" and the "ShortCut for -C-Drive.xbe"
   to something your BIOS can boot (evoxdash.xbe + evoxdash.cfg) + copy both
   files to the ROOT of your -C-Drive.
   !! Double check !! you did everything right then reboot - Voila ! 

.:...............................................................................:.
 ^                                                                               ^
   RELEASE NOTES:

   Updated MC360 Skin to SVN Revision 33
   Updated Apple Movie Trailers to SVN Revision 687
   Updated YouTube to SVN Revision 687
   Updated XBMCScripts Installer to V 1.7    

.:...............................................................................:.
 ^                                                                               ^
   CHANGELOG:

   These are the topmost 3 lines of the changes included in this Release.   
   You can find the complete Changelogs in /docs/Changelog.txt.
   
   2007-03-03  8004  changed: removed unused functions in IPlayer changed:
                     moved hack for unpausing player before seek into players
                     that need it instead of global added: frame stepping for
                     mplayer (thnx to asteron for idea and initial patch) added:
                     preliminary code for framestepping in dvdplayer, currently
                     disabled as it causes audio desync on unpause.
   2007-03-03  8003  fixed: XBMC_PC didn&#039;t show the Internet sate due to System
                     Info changes.
   2007-03-03  8002  added: CPU idle thread with HLT instruction to cool and
                     lower energy usage. (thanks michaelbrumm!)

.:...............................................................................:.
 ^                                                                               ^
   THANKS:

   All the XBMC developers !!
   This Software makes the XBOX worth soOo much more for all of us !
   Everyone contributing to the scene !

.:...............................................................................:.
 ^                                                                               ^
   PS:

   Enjoy & Please Seeeeed !
